title: IBM
description: Offering innovative energy storage solutions—including batteries, flywheels, and pumped-hydro systems—to facilitate the integration of renewable energy into power grids, this company aids in reducing fossil fuel dependence and helps countries achieve their net-zero goals.

title: Omazaki Group
description: Specializing in comprehensive energy solutions, this business offers a unique integration of renewable energy systems, advanced energy storage methods, and post-construction management, ensuring optimized energy efficiency tailored to client needs.
